title: Band, 16th century
medium:
Medium: linen, silk
Technique: silk long armed cross and back stitches on linen plain weave
dimensions:
H x W: 133 x 15 cm (52 3/8 x 5 7/8 in.)
Repeat H: 23.5 cm (9 1/4 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Pattern of curving plant forms in reserve against a red background. Warp-faced woven band with weft elements forming the fringe attached on two sides.

tombstone.epitaph:
Band, 16th century.
16th century. Medium: linen, silk
Technique: silk long armed cross and back stitches on linen plain weave. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-58-17.
